name: Machu
description: Located high in the Andes mountains of Peru, Machu Picchu is now believed to have been a sacred royal retreat for the Incan rulers.

name: The Colosseum
description: Take some time to explore the outskirts of Rome, too. Consider a hike along a tomb-lined section of the Appian Way.

name: Pyramids
description: The Pyramids of Giza take ancient to a whole other level. These were built over 4,500 years ago.

name: Canyon
description: This incredible natural wonder is in the U.S. state of Arizona. It's one of those beautiful places.

name: Petra
description: You may have an Indiana Jones feeling as you walk through a 1.2-kilometer-long narrow crack in the sandstone hills.

name: Great Wall
description: In a land of modern cities and towering skyscrapers, the Great Wall of China, built between the 14th and 17th centuries.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: No visit to the French capital is complete without a trip to and a trip up its most iconic structure.

name: Borobudur
description: Borobudur dates from the 9th century and is one of the largest Buddhist temples in the world.

name: Marrakesh
description: Start your Marrakech adventure in the Jemaa el-Fnaa, the main, open square in the Moroccan city.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: One of the five boroughs of New York City, Manhattan is actually an island, bordered by the East River.
